attributes.action: Remove the State Pension amount from HMRC Personal Tax Allowance.
attributes.additional_details: To reduce financial pressure on UK pensioners.
attributes.background: If the State Pension amount was removed from the Personal Tax Allowance it would relieve financial issues from the majority of Pensioners thus reducing need for any Pension credits.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign one of these petitions, which call for similar action:

"Raise the personal tax allowance to the state pension rate"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/746077

"Introduce new tax code for state pensioners with double the personal allowance"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/740671
